translations: 改变；变更；服装修改（alteration 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Making some simple alterations to your diet will make you feel fitter.
sentences.translation: 对你的饮食做一些简单的改变会使你感觉更健康。

sentences.sentence: Please be so kind as to see to it that all the alterations are made at once!
sentences.translation: 请注意所有变更必须马上完成！

sentences.sentence: Make any alterations as you may think fit.
